featured.text: About 200 million years ago this super-continent broke up into two continents: Laurasia and Gondwana.

definition.zh_def: 勞拉西亞：在古生物學中，指一個古代的超大陸，包含現今的北美洲、歐洲和亞洲的部分地區。
definition.en_def: Laurasia: A prehistoric supercontinent that included present-day North America, Europe, and parts of Asia.
definition.example: Laurasia was formed during the late Paleozoic era.
